title: Cox's Bazar
details: The beach in Cox's Bazar has a gentle slope and with an unbroken length of 155 km (96 mi) it is often termed the 'longest natural unbroken sea beach' in the world.

title: Sajek
details: Sajek is a popular tourist destination located in the Rangamati Hill District of Bangladesh. It is a remote hill station nestled in the lush greenery of the Chittagong Hill Tracts region.

title: Rangamati
details: Rangamati is a district located in southeastern Bangladesh. It is situated in the Chittagong Hill Tracts region, which is known for its scenic beauty and diverse indigenous cultures.

title: Bandarban
details: Bandarban is a district located in the southeastern part of Bangladesh. It is one of the three districts that make up the Chittagong Hill Tracts, which is a mountainous region known for its natural beauty.
